content.rendered: Jeff Napoli and Leah Johnson, our Hillsboro personal injury attorneys, have over 40 years of combined experience. Although most cases settle without a lawsuit, if you aren’t getting a fair offer, Mr. Napoli and Ms. Johnson have significant trial experience, both as former deputy district attorneys, and as personal injury lawyers.
